com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice

Interface AnnotatorWrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotatorWrapperImpl, AnnotatorWrapperSystemT

    public interface AnnotatorWrapper
    Interface encapsulating the major functionality of an annotator runtime supported by the Annotator Module: the ability to execute the annotator on a given document, and the ability to interrupt execution; all instances of annotator runtimes supported by the Annotation Module implement this interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the annotator and clear the resource allocated for the annotator
      com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jsonSchema.types.ObjectSchema getOutputSchema(List<String> inputSchema)
      Computes the output schema of this annotator
      default com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getShortOutputViewSchema(List<String> inputSchema)
      Computes the short output schema of this annotator (see AnnotatorWrapperSystemT.getShortOutputViewSchema(ViewMetadata)
      void interrupt()
      Interrupts the annotation process, i.e., the call to invoke(JsonNode, String)
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode invoke(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document, String langCode)
      Annotate the input document with the given language.
      default void save(String zipFilePath, boolean compileDictionaries) 
      boolean supportsInterrupt()
      Whether the annotator runtime supports interruption; annotators that don't support interrupt are never interrupted (even though the user might have requested interruption)

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode invoke(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document,
                                                      String langCode)
                                               throws AnnotationServiceException
        Annotate the input document with the given language.
        Parameters:
        document - the input document as a JSON record; the input document is ontology mapped; this method assumes the input record contains fields containing actual content, but also fields containing metadata (for example, to indicate the language or the content type of the document); this method does not validate that the record conforms to the ontology; instead, this method queries the input schema of the annotator and passes through to the annotator the values of the expected fields from the input document record; for example, in the case of a SystemT annotator, this method queries the schema of the view Document; if a field expected by the annotator does not exist in the input record, or the field exists but has an incompatible type, this method throws an exception; in the case of UIMA annotators, the current implementation assumes that the input document contains a field named AnnotationServiceConstants.DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME of type String and will throw an exception otherwise
        langCode - 2-letter language code of the input document content
        Returns:
        a JSON record with as many fields as output type names in the given annotator bundle config, where each element is a non-null JSON array (potentially empty) containing the annotator results of that type; the value of the second field is a non-null JSON record containing information about: input document size (in characters), running time (in milliseconds), number of annotations output, whether the annotation was interrupted due to running time exceeding the given timeout, and exception information (if any)
        Throws:
        AnnotationServiceException - if any exception encountered during the execution

      • interrupt

        void interrupt()
        throws AnnotationServiceException
        Interrupts the annotation process, i.e., the call to invoke(JsonNode, String)
        Throws:
        AnnotationServiceException - if any exception encountered during the execution

      • supportsInterrupt

        boolean supportsInterrupt()
        Whether the annotator runtime supports interruption; annotators that don't support interrupt are never interrupted (even though the user might have requested interruption)
        Returns:
        true if the annotator runtime supports interruption; false otherwise

      • close

        void close()
    throws AnnotationServiceException
        Closes the annotator and clear the resource allocated for the annotator
        Throws:
        AnnotationServiceException

      • getOutputSchema

        com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jsonSchema.types.ObjectSchema getOutputSchema(List<String> inputSchema)
                                                                    throws Exception
        Computes the output schema of this annotator
        Parameters:
        inputSchema - a list of field names already defined in the input schema; will skip processing for field names of output schema if it exists in the input schema
        Returns:
        a JSON Schema of output
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        AnnotatorWrapperSystemT.getOutputSchema(List), AnnotatorWrapperUIMA#getOutputSchema(List)

      • getShortOutputViewSchema

        default com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getShortOutputViewSchema(List<String> inputSchema)
                                                                         throws Exception
        Computes the short output schema of this annotator (see AnnotatorWrapperSystemT.getShortOutputViewSchema(ViewMetadata)
        Parameters:
        inputSchema - a list of field names already defined in the input schema; will skip processing for field names of output schema if it exists in the input schema
        Returns:
        an ObjectNode of output
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
